extendedInfo.description: 7th Annual West Virginia Statewide Technology Conference August 1-5, Morgantown, WV The WVSTC serves participants from higher education, K-12, and state agencies. The purpose is to foster partnerships among the groups by exchanging the latest technology advances and uses, and by sharing individual expertise with a broader audience. Participants can choose from more than 150 concurrent sessions, develop contacts with vendor exhibitors and network with other technology specialists. We look forward to seeing you in Morgantown.

reviews.title: Mostly good.
reviews.comment: Useful, but has invasive permissions. Annoying that it goes to the top of the list again after each time you view a session description.
reviews.author: A Google User
